codeReview.name: Code Review - ZZIK LIVE Standards
codeReview.description: Review code against ZZIK LIVE quality standards
codeReview.template:
Review the following code for:
1. TypeScript strict mode compliance
2. WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility
3. Privacy: No raw coordinates (geohash5 only)
4. Performance: LCP ≤ 1.5s target
5. Security: Protected routes, API 401 checks
6. Neo-minimal UI: Text-first, minimal icons

Code:
```
{{code}}
```

Provide specific improvements with examples.

componentGeneration.name: Generate React Component
componentGeneration.template:
Generate a React component with these requirements:

Component: {{componentName}}
Purpose: {{purpose}}

Requirements:
- Functional component with TypeScript
- ARIA attributes for accessibility
- Neo-minimal design tokens from globals.css
- Client component if interactive ('use client')
- Props interface with JSDoc comments
- Error boundaries where needed

Design Tokens:
- Colors: var(--text), var(--brand), var(--border)
- Typography: .text-h1, .text-h2, .text-body
- Focus: .focus-ring utility
- No inline styles unless dynamic

Generate complete, production-ready code.

apiEndpoint.name: Create API Endpoint
apiEndpoint.description: Generate secure API route with validation
apiEndpoint.template:
Create a Next.js API route:

Endpoint: {{endpoint}}
Method: {{method}}
Purpose: {{purpose}}

Requirements:
1. Rate limiting (proxy.ts checks)
2. Input validation with Zod
3. Error handling with proper status codes
4. Logging with request ID
5. Privacy: geohash5 only, no raw coordinates
6. Protected routes: Check zzik_session cookie
7. TypeScript strict mode

Generate app/api/{{endpoint}}/route.ts with full implementation.

accessibilityAudit.name: Accessibility Audit
accessibilityAudit.template:
Audit accessibility for:

Target: {{target}}

WCAG 2.1 AA Checklist:
1. Semantic HTML (h1-h6 hierarchy)
2. ARIA attributes (role, aria-label, aria-*)
3. Keyboard navigation (tab, arrow keys)
4. Focus management (focus-ring, tabIndex)
5. Color contrast (≥ 4.5:1 text, ≥ 3:1 large)
6. Touch targets (≥ 44×44 CSS px)
7. Screen reader support
8. Form labels and error messages

Provide:
- Issues found with severity
- Code fixes with examples
- axe-core test coverage

performanceOptimization.name: Optimize Performance
performanceOptimization.description: Improve page load and runtime performance
performanceOptimization.template:
Optimize performance for:

Target: {{target}}
Current Metrics: {{metrics}}

Optimization Areas:
1. Bundle size (code splitting, tree shaking)
2. Images (next/image, lazy loading)
3. Fonts (font-display: swap)
4. JavaScript (dynamic imports, defer)
5. CSS (critical CSS, unused styles)
6. Caching (headers, service worker)
7. Database queries (indexing, N+1)

Provide:
- Specific optimizations
- Before/after metrics
- Implementation priority
- Testing approach

securityReview.name: Security Review
securityReview.template:
Security review for:

Target: {{target}}

Security Checklist:
1. Input validation (XSS, SQL injection)
2. Authentication (session, tokens)
3. Authorization (route guards, API checks)
4. Privacy (geohash5, PII masking)
5. CSRF protection (SameSite cookies)
6. CSP headers (proxy.ts configuration)
7. Rate limiting (API protection)
8. Dependency vulnerabilities

Provide:
- Vulnerabilities found (CVSS score)
- Remediation steps
- Code examples
- Testing verification
